## IRenderingContext type

A cross-environment type that covers the types of canvas rendering contexts returned by the supported canvas.getContext calls.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IRenderingContext = ICanvasRenderingContext2D | IImageBitmapRenderingContext;
```
